basic.description: This lab includes instrumentation and measuring techniques; current, voltage, and power measurements; response of passive circuits; AC and DC design; computer application.
basic.subject: EEL
basic.title: Advanced Circuits with Computers Laboratory

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: EEL 3111, EEL 4905 (Taken as ECE Engineering Tools Lab). Corequisite: EEL 3112.
